name: Peking Duck
description: A specific Chinese method of cooking duck, where the meat is roasted until the skin becomes crispy, then served with hoisin sauce, green onions, and thin pancakes.

name: Hot Pot (Huoguo)
description: A cooking method where fresh ingredients such as meat, vegetables, and noodles are boiled in a flavorful broth in a pot placed at the center of the table.

name: Sweet and Sour Pork
description: Pieces of fried pork covered in a sweet and sour sauce, often served with vegetables.
